explanation: [0-0] Speakerman is standing on a rooftop in a city. He's wearing a black suit with a red tie, and he only has one arm.

[0-4] Speakerman starts walking to the right, then turns his head to look at the Cameraman. The Cameraman is surrounded by a barbell, kettlebell, and a black piece of exercise equipment. He bends down and lifts the barbell with both hands, shaking it. The scene switches back to Speakerman, who shakes his head.

[0-4] Speakerman starts walking to the right, then turns his head to look at the Cameraman. The Cameraman is surrounded by a barbell, kettlebell, and a black piece of exercise equipment. He bends down and lifts the barbell with both hands, shaking it. The scene switches back to Speakerman, who shakes his head.

[0-4] Speakerman starts walking to the right, then turns his head to look at the Cameraman. The Cameraman is surrounded by a barbell, kettlebell, and a black piece of exercise equipment. He bends down and lifts the barbell with both hands, shaking it. The scene switches back to Speakerman, who shakes his head.

[4-13] The scene changes again to a man with a smile walking out from behind a wall. He swings his right arm, holding a sparkling gold star-shaped object. The scene switches back to Speakerman, and two picture frames appear above his head. The left frame shows a person who looks like him but with complete arms, while the right frame shows a stack of banknotes. He jumps up, looking left and right. Then a green progress bar, a fist with an extended index finger, and the white English subtitles "What will you choose?" appear at the top of the screen. Below the text are a thumbs-up icon, the white English word "OR," and a share arrow icon. As the index finger clicks on the thumbs-up icon and the arrow icon respectively, the progress bar above decreases rapidly. When the index finger continuously clicks the arrow icon, the progress bar turns red and then disappears. Speakerman raises his left hand, choosing the picture frame with the banknotes. A stack of banknotes appears in his hand.

A green progress bar appears above his head, with a thumbs-up icon below it, followed by a yellow "=" sign and an image of Speakerman with both arms. As the index finger continuously clicks on the thumbs-up icon, the progress bar decreases rapidly. When the progress bar turns red and disappears, the man raises the shining gold star-shaped object. The scene cuts back to the Speakerman man and woman. A cloud of smoke rises from beneath the Speakerman man's feet, and he now has both arms.
